other_tests.findings: In Case 1, FISH study showed only a single IGF1R gene due to a deletion on chromosome 15q26.2. In Case 2, FISH study confirmed three copies of the IGF1R gene.
Fibroblasts from Case 1 (one copy of IGF1R) showed slower growth, while those from Case 2 (three copies of IGF1R) showed accelerated growth.
Adequate GH (basal, 8.3 mU/liter; stimulated, 30.4 mU/liter) and cortisol (basal, 397 nmol/liter; stimulated, 954 nmol/liter) responses.

other_tests.date: When she was 2 years and 9 months old
